titlestmt.titleproper: Richard Symonds Collection of Connecticut Railroads Annual Reports 1988.0062
Symonds (Richard) Collection of Connecticut Railroads Annual Reports
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by The finding aid was creted by Laura Smith.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-06-02T13:21-0400

did.unittitle: Richard Symonds Collection of Connecticut Railroads Annual Reports

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: Collection consists of annual reports submitted by approximately 80 Connecticut railroads and street railroads to the State Railroad Commission and the Public Utilities Commission. Reports include brief histories of the companies, lists of company organizations, officer and property owners, track information, and financial data.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of annual reports submitted by approximately 80 Connecticut mainline railroads and street railroads, most of which are affiliated or owned by the New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad, to the State Railroad Commission and the Public Utilities Commission. The reports include brief histories of the companies, lists of company organizations, officer and property owners, track information, and financial data.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Richard Symonds in 1988.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Richard Symonds is a resident of Tolland, Connecticut, and a collector of railroad documents.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Richard Symonds Collection of Connecticut Railroads Annual Reports. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to New England railroads. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

did.unittitle: Series I: Railroad Annual Reports Collection,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Boston and New York Air Line Railroad (1886-1906), Branford Lighting and Water Company (1902-1905), Bridgeport Traction Company (1894-1900), Bristol & Plainville Tramway Company (1895-1910), Central New England & Western Railroad (1890-1892), Central New England Railway (1899-1900)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Central New England Railway (1901-1910), Central Railway and Electric Company (1894-1898), Cheshire Street Railway (1904, 1906), Colchester Railway Company (1886-1905)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Connecticut Central Company (1886-1887), The Connecticut Company (1907-1910), Connecticut Lighting and Power Company (1899-1900), Connecticut Railway Lighting Company (1901-1910), The Consolidated Railway Company (1904, 1906), Danbury and Bethel Street Railway Company (1894-1910), Danbury and Norwalk Company (1886-1901)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Danbury and Norwalk Company (1902-1905), Danielson and Norwich Street Railway (1902), Derby Street Railway (1894-1901), East Hartford and Glastonbury Horse Railroad (1894-1905), East Windsor Street Railway (1910), Enfield and Longmeadow Electric Railway (1897-1900), Fair Haven and Westville Railroad (1894-1902), Farmington Street Railway (1900-1909), Greenwich Tramway Company (1902-1905), Groton and Stonington Street Railway (1905-1910), Hartford & Connecticut Valley Railroad (1886-1892), Hartford and Connecticut Western Railroad (1886-1892)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Hartford and Connecticut Western Railroad (1894-1910), Hartford and Harlem Railroad (1886-1887), Hartford and Springfield Street Railroad (1901-1909), Hartford & West Hartford Horse Railroad (1895-1898), Hartford, Manchester & Rockville Tramway (1895-1905), Hartford Street Railway (1894-1902)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Housatonic Railroad (1886-1898), Manufacturers Railroad (1898-1905), Meriden and Cromwell Railroad (1886-1887), Meriden Electric Railroad (1895-1902), Meriden, Southington & Compounce Tramway (1889-1906), Meriden, Waterbury and Connecticut River Railroad (1889-1898), Middletown, Meriden & Waterbury Railroad (1899-1905)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: Middletown Street Railway (1895-1902), Milford Street Railway (1899-1900), Montville Street Railway (1900-1904), Naugatuck Railroad (1886-1905), New England Railroad (1896-1906)]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: New Haven & Centerville Street Railway (1894-1998), New Haven and Derby Railroad (1886-1905), New Haven and Northampton Company (1886-1902)]

scopecontent.p: [Subjects include: New London Northern (1905-1910), New London Street Railway (1894-1905), New York Air Line Railway (1886-1899), New York & New England Railroad (1886-1895), New York, Bridgeport & Eastern Railroad (1891), New York, Providence & Boston Railroad (1886-1892), Norwalk Street Railway (1894-1901), Norwalk Tramway Company (1894-1901)]
